metadata.title: CVE-2019-15213 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2.3. There is ause-after-free caused by a malicious USB device in thedrivers/media/usb/dvb-usb/dvb-usb-init.c driver.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
